_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Hytale Server
author: admin@micheal.cc
description: Hytale Dedicated Server using the official CLI downloader. Requires Java 25.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Hytale Server Install Script with Auth Support

apt update
apt install -y curl unzip

# 1. Download the Official Downloader Tool
echo "Fetching Hytale Downloader Tool..."
curl -L "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" -o downloader.zip
unzip -o downloader.zip
chmod +x hytale-downloader-linux-amd64

# 2. Run the Downloader
# If credentials exist, this runs automatically. If not, it waits for you to auth.
echo "------------------------------------------------------"
echo "STARTING DOWNLOADER..."
echo "If this is a fresh install, click the server name and check the INSTALL OUTPUT for the auth link."
echo "------------------------------------------------------"

./hytale-downloader-linux-amd64 -download-path server_files.zip -patchline ${PATCHLINE}

# 3. Unpack the actual game files
if [ -f "server_files.zip" ]; then
    echo "Download successful. Unpacking game files..."
    unzip -o server_files.zip
    rm server_files.zip
else
    echo "ERROR: Game files not found. Did you complete the authentication?"
    exit 1
fi

# 4. Cleanup
rm downloader.zip
echo "Installation complete."

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the main server jar file.

variables.name: Patchline
variables.description: The release channel to download (e.g. live, pre-release).

variables.name: Download URL
variables.description: URL to download the downloader tool.

variables.name: Override Session Token
variables.description: Optional: For Server Providers using the API auth flow.

variables.name: Override Identity Token
variables.description: Optional: For Server Providers using the API auth flow.
